item.title: Morgan Stanley upgrades this AI play, says stock can jump more than 20%
item.description: The bank upgraded the cloud software maker to overweight from equal weight.

item.title: Buy the dip on these credit card giants as stablecoin weakness is overblown, says Wells Fargo
item.description: Investors should consider taking advantage of the recent pullback in shares of these two credit card giants, Wells Fargo said Tuesday.

item.title: Using options to buy the dip on this credit card name while hedging risk
item.description: Options trader Nishant Pant breaks down an options strategy for buying the dip on this credit card stock.

item.title: A rumored AI acquisition would get Apple stock out of 'penalty box,' says Bank of America
item.description: Apple reportedly weighing the acquisition of Perplexity AI could mean a boost for the iPhone maker's shares, according to Bank of America.

item.title: JPMorgan for now isn't buying that Bill Ackman can create the next Berkshire Hathaway
item.description: JPMorgan believes the direction of the stock will increasingly depend on the potential new investments Ackman makes, which creates an uncertain outloo...
